Vfricou.Apps

Collection version 1.0.0

  • Description

  • Plugin Index

  • Role Index

Description

Various applications collection containing roles and modules

Author:

  • Vincent FRICOU

Supported ansible-core versions:

  • 2.15.0 or newer

  • Issue Tracker
  • Repository (Sources)

Plugin Index

There are no plugins in the vfricou.apps collection with automatically generated documentation.

Role Index

These are the roles in the vfricou.apps collection:

  • consul role – Install and configure Hashicorp Consul

  • minio role – Install and configure Minio standalone

  • nginx role – Install and configure Nginx

See also

List of collections with docs hosted here.
